LocalFinalVariableName.description:
Description

Checks that local final variable names conform to a specified pattern.
A catch parameter and resources in try statements
are considered to be a local, final variables.
LocalFinalVariableName.option:
format, Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers., Pattern, "^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens

VARIABLE_DEF
,
PARAMETER_DEF
,
RESOURCE
